## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10173">Rijbewijsnummer van Spanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10173">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10174">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10175">acht cijfers gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n teken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10175">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10176">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10177">acht cijfers, gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n teken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10177">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10178">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10178">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10179">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10179">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10180">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10181">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10181">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10182">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10183">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10184">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10184">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10185">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10185">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10186">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10187">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10187">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10321">Spanje DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10321">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10322">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10322">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10323">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10323">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10324">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10324">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10325">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10325">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10326">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10326">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10327">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10327">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10328">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10328">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10329">acht cijfers gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n teken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10329">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10330">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10330">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10331">zeven cijfers gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n teken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10331">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10332">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10332">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10333">Een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10333">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10334">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10334">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10335">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10336">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10336">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10337">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10338">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10338">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10339">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10339">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10340">Er wordt een  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10340">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10341">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10341">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10342">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10342">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10366">Spanje paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10366">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10367">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10367">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10368">een combinatie van letters en getallen met acht of negen tekens zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10368">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10369">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10369">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10370">een combinatie van letters en cijfers met acht of negen tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10370">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10371">twee cijfers of letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10371">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10372">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10372">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10373">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10373">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10374">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10374">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10375">Niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10375">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10376">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10376">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10377">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10377">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10378">Met de normale  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10378">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10379">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10379">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10380">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` indeling DD-MM-YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10380">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10381">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10381">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10382">Met de normale  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10382">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10383">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10383">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10412">Spanje sociaal-zekerheidsnummer (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10412">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10413">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10414">11-12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10414">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10415">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10416">11-12 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10416">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10417">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10417">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10418">a forward slash (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10418">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10419">zeven tot acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10419">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10420">a forward slash (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10420">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10421">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10421">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10422">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10422">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10423">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10423">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10424">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10424">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10425">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10425">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10426">De functie Func_spanish_social_security_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10426">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10427">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10427">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10428">Er wordt een  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10428">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10429">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10430">De functie Func_spanish_social_security_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10430">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10431">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10431">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10440">Btw-nummer van Spanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10440">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10441">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10441">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10442">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10442">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10443">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10443">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10444">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10444">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10445">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10445">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10446">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10446">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10447">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10448">zeven of acht cijfers en een of twee letters in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10448">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10449">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10450">Spaanse natuurlijke personen met een Nationale identiteitskaart van Spanje:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10450">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10451">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10451">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10452">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10452">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10453">Niet-ingezetene Spanjaarden zonder spaanse nationale identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10453">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10454">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter 'L' (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10454">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10455">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10455">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10456">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10456">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10457">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10457">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10458">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter 'K' (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10458">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10459">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10459">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10460">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10460">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10461">Buitenlanders met het identificatienummer van een buitenlander</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10461">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10462">een hoofdletter met de naam 'X', 'Y' of 'Z' (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10462">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10463">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10463">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10464">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10464">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10465">Buitenlanders zonder het identificatienummer van een buitenlander</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10465">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10466">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter met de letter 'M' (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10466">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10467">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10467">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10468">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10468">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10469">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10469">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10470">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10470">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10471">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10471">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10472">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10472">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10473">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10473">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10474">Er wordt een  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10474">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10475">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10475">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10476">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10476">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10507">SQL Server verbindingsreeks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10507">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10508">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10509">De tekenreeks 'Gebruikers-id', 'Gebruikers-id', 'uid' of 'UserId' gevolgd door de tekens en tekenreeksen die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10509">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10510">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10510">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10511">de tekenreeks 'Gebruikers-id', 'Gebruikers-id', 'uid' of 'UserId'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10511">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10512">een combinatie van 1-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10512">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10513">de tekenreeks 'Wachtwoord' of 'pwd' waarbij 'pwd' niet wordt voorafgegaan door een kleine letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10513">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10514">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10514">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10515">een teken dat geen dollarteken ($), procentsymbool (%), groter dan symbool (>), bij symbool (@), aanhalingsteken ("), puntkomma (;), linkerbrace([) of linker vierkante haak ({)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10515">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10516">een combinatie van 7-128 tekens die geen puntkomma zijn (;), slash (/) of aanhalingsteken (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10516">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10517">een puntkomma (;) of aanhalingsteken (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10517">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10518">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10518">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10519">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10519">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10520">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10520">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10521">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10521">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10522">De normale expressie CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10522">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10523">Een trefwoord CEP_GlobalFilter wordt niet gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10523">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10524">De normale expressie CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon, wordt niet gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10524">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10525">In de CEP_CommonExampleKeywords wordt geen inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10525">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10534">Wachtwoord of pwd gevolgd door 0-2 spaties, een gelijkteken (=), 0-2 spaties en een sterretje (\*) -OF-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10534">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>

    - <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10539">Groter dan symbool (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10539">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10553">Rijbewijsnummer van Zweden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10553">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10554">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10555">10 cijfers met een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10555">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10556">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10557">10 cijfers met een afbreekstreester:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10557">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10558">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10558">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10559">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10559">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10560">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10560">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10561">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10562">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10563">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10564">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10565">Met de normale  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10565">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10566">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10699">Zweedse nationale id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10699">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10700">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10701">10 of 12 cijfers en een optioneel scheidingsteken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10701">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10702">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10703">10 of 12 cijfers en een optioneel scheidingsteken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10703">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10704">twee cijfers (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10704">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10705">Zes cijfers in datumnotatie YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10705">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10706">scheidingsteken van "-" of "+" (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10706">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10707">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10707">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10708">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10709">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10709">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10710">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10711">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10712">Met de `Func_swedish_national_identifier` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10712">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10713">Er wordt een `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` trefwoord uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10713">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10714">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10714">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10715">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10715">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10716">Met de `Func_swedish_national_identifier` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10716">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10717">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10717">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10736">Zweden paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10736">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10737">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10738">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10738">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10739">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10740">acht opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10740">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10741">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10742">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10742">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10743">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10744">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10744">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10745">met de normale expressie Regex_sweden_passport_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10745">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10746">een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_sweden_passport` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10746">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10747">met de normale expressie wordt een datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10747">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10748">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10748">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10749">met de normale expressie Regex_sweden_passport_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10749">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10750">een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_sweden_passport` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10750">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10786">Btw-nummer zweden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10786">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10787">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10787">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10788">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10788">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10789">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10789">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10790">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10790">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10791">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10791">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10792">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10792">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10793">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10793">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10794">10 cijfers en een symbool in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10794">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10795">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10795">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10796">10 cijfers en een symbool:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10796">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10797">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10797">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10798">een plusteken of minteken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10798">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10799">drie cijfers die het identificatienummer uniek maken op de volgende plaatsen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10799">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10800">voor getallen die vÃ³Ã³r 1990 zijn uitgegeven, wordt met het zevende en achtste cijfer het geboorteland of de in het buitenland geboren personen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10800">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10801">het cijfer in de negende positie geeft geslacht aan door oneven voor mannelijke of zelfs voor vrouwelijke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10801">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10802">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10802">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10803">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10804">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10804">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10805">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10806">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10806">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10807">Met de  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10807">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10808">Er wordt een  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10808">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10809">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10809">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10810">Met de  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10810">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10836">SWIFT-code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10836">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10837">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10838">vier letters gevolgd door 5-31 letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10838">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10839">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10840">vier letters gevolgd door 5-31 letters of cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10840">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10841">bankcode met vier letters (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10841">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10842">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10842">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10843">4-28 letters of cijfers (het basisrekeningnummer (BBAN))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10843">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10844">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10844">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10845">Ã©Ã©n tot drie letters of cijfers (rest van de BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10845">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10846">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10846">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10847">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10847">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10848">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10848">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10849">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10849">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10850">De normale expressie Regex_swift inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10850">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10851">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_swift gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10851">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10888">Zwitserland SSN AHV-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10888">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10889">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10889">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10890">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10890">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10891">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10891">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10892">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10892">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10893">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10893">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10894">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10894">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10895">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10896">13-cijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10896">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10897">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10898">13-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10898">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10899">drie cijfers - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10899">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10900">een optionele punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10900">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10901">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10901">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10902">een optionele punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10902">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10903">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10903">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10904">een optionele punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10904">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10905">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10905">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10906">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10907">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10907">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10908">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10909">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10909">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10910">Met de Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10910">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10911">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10911">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10912">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10912">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10913">Met de Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10913">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10934">Taiwan national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10934">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10935">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10936">Ã©Ã©n letter (in het Engels) gevolgd door negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10936">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10937">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10938">een letter (in het Engels) gevolgd door negen cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10938">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10939">Ã©Ã©n letter (in het Engels, niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10939">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10940">het cijfer '1' of '2'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10940">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10941">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10941">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10942">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10942">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10943">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10943">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10944">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10944">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10945">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10945">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10946">Met de Func_taiwanese_national_id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10946">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10947">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_taiwanese_national_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10947">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10948">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10948">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10949">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10949">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10950">Met de Func_taiwanese_national_id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10950">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10951">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10951">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10968">Taiwan paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10968">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10969">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10969">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10970">biometrisch paspoortnummer: negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10970">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10971">niet-biometrisch paspoortnummer: negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10971">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10972">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10972">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10973">biometrisch paspoortnummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10973">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10974">het teken '3'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10974">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10975">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10975">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10976">niet-biometrisch paspoortnummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10976">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10977">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10977">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10978">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10979">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10979">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10980">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10981">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10982">De normale expressie Regex_taiwan_passport inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10982">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10983">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_taiwan_passport gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10983">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10994">Taiwan-ingezeten certificaatnummer (ARC/TARC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10994">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10996">10 letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10996">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10997">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11004">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11004">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11005">De normale expressie Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11005">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11006">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11006">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

  </Pattern>
</Entity>

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11020">Thaise bevolkingsidentificatiecode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11020">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11021">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11021">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11022">13 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11022">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11023">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11023">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11024">13 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11024">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11025">eerste cijfer is geen nul of negen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11025">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11026">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11026">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11027">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11027">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11028">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11028">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11029">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11029">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11030">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11030">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11031">Met de Func_Thai_Citizen_Id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11031">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11032">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11032">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11033">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11033">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11034">Met de Func_Thai_Citizen_Id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11034">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11062">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11062">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11063">rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11063">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11064">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11064">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11065">Combinatie van 18 letters en cijfers in de opgegeven notatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11065">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11066">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11067">18 letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11067">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11068">Vijf letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) of het cijfer '9' in plaats van een letter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11068">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11069">EÃ©n cijfer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11069">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11070">Vijf cijfers in de datumnotatie MMDDY voor geboortedatum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11070">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11071">Het zevende teken wordt verhoogd met 50 als het stuurprogramma een vrouw is. voor examen, 51 tot 62 in plaats van 01 tot 12.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11071">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11072">Twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) of het cijfer '9' in plaats van een letter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11072">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11073">Vijf cijfers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11073">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11074">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11075">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11075">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11076">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11077">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11077">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11078">Met de `Func_uk_drivers_license` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11078">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11079">Er wordt een `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11079">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11080">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11080">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11081">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11081">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11082">Met de `Func_uk_drivers_license` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11082">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11083">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11083">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
